titleStmt.title: The great and grievous oppression of the subject; exhibited in a remonstrance to the Parliament: wherein-is more particularly set forth, the unjust dealings of the two corporations of Hull and Headon in the county of York. By Robert Raikes Gent.
titleStmt.author: Raikes, Robert, of Headon.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
